mapper.select: select c.cart_num, p.product_img, p.product_name, c.cart_count, p.product_price, o.options_name, o.options_price, p.product_num from product p join cart c on p.product_num = c.product_num join options o on c.options_num = o.options_num where c.member_id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cart_num, options_num, product_num, member_id, cart_count) select cart_seq.nextval, options_num, product_num, member_id, 1 from likes where likes_num = #{likes_num}
